component.name: Reader Vault Pro
component.summary: Save and read books, guides, and long-form text offline

description.p: Reader Vault Pro lets you save books, game guides, articles, and any long-form text for offline reading with progress tracking, word highlighting, and encrypted cross-device sync.

ul.li: Load text from a file (PDF or TXT), paste directly, or fetch from a URL
Trim and edit content before saving
Export and import an encrypted backup link to sync between devices
